content: to assist with the picot bind off https //www youtube com/watch v=6mxolyirwgi picot bind-off *co 3 sts using the cable co method k2tog tbl place st back onto left needle 6 times repeat from * until all sts have been bound off weave in ends and wet block shawl to desired measurements to smooth fabric watch this westknits video to assist with blocking your shawl https //youtu be/mfnfvwqao5y © 2014 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 3 collaboration with stevenbe com & drawfourdesigns com photography by tom duevel version 3
